Metasploit

Logan W will be giving a presentation on Metasploit: “Metasploit is one of the most powerful and versatile tools available to penetration testers both novice and professional. There will be opportunity to practice all of the methods in the talk using the ISELab environment.”

Beginner’s Night

Logan K will give a beginner’s night on Nmap, one of the most common network scanners, used to discover hosts, services, and vulnerabilities.
